text:
Oh, hello.
Sorry, I was just taking a short break...

No need to apologize. It seemed like you
were having fun, so I just asked.

Oh, no... Yes. ...I was watching the
rehearsal video from the other day.

The three of us are gradually syncing up,
and unexpectedly, it makes me happy.

I see...!
It's all thanks to everyone's hard work.

I know we still have a long way to go, but...
...I'm glad it's the three of us.

Being able to work hard with friends I like, even if it's
just a little... it feels like I'm getting closer to my ideal self.

I see...
Hiori, those are important feelings.

Yes...!
But still, we're just at the starting line.

I'm determined to produce good results at our debut live
so that we can shine brighter from now on.

(From now on, huh... From my perspective,
Illumination Stars has already started shining.)
